author: David
content: Can someone explain useState vs useReducer? When should I use which?

replies.author: Emily
replies.content: useState for simple state, useReducer when you have complex state logic or multiple sub-values.

replies.author: David
replies.content: Thanks! So for a form with many fields, useReducer would be better?

replies.author: Emily
replies.content: Exactly! Especially if field updates depend on other fields.

replies.author: Chris
replies.content: Or you could use a form library like React Hook Form. Much simpler!

replies.author: David
replies.content: Good suggestion! I'll check it out.

replies.author: Rachel
replies.content: I prefer useReducer when state transitions need to be predictable and testable.
